This Easy Southwestern Black Bean Salad has Macaroni, beans, Veggies tossed in a Creamy sauce made with Black Beans! Always a hit at Potlucks and picnics. Everyday Ingredients.
Free of Dairy, egg, oil, soy, nut. Can be made corn-free and gluten-free with gf pasta.

recipeIngredient: 4 to 6 oz mac elbows pasta (use gluten-free if needed)
15 oz black beans, drained and rinsed  (or 1.5 cups cooked)
1 cup chopped ripe tomatoes (or grape tomatoes)
1/2 cup chopped green or red bell pepper
1/3 cup black beans (from the salad ingredients above or from another can, drained)
1/2 tsp or more chipotle pepper ground or flakes
2 tbsp pickled jalapeno (or use chopped jalapeno + 1/2 tsp vinegar)
1 to 3 Tbsp lime juice to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the pasta according to instructions. (Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Add salt and pasta and cook until cooked to preference. Drain, rinse and keep aside)
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the pasta according to instructions. (Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Add salt and pasta and cook until cooked to preference. Drain, rinse and keep aside)

recipeInstructions.text: Make the dressing: Blend the black beans, non dairy milk with the rest of the ingredients. Taste and adjust salt, spice and tang. Blend until smooth and keep aside. Use more beans and less non dairy milk for creamier dressing.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the dressing: Blend the black beans, non dairy milk with the rest of the ingredients. Taste and adjust salt, spice and tang. Blend until smooth and keep aside. Use more beans and less non dairy milk for creamier dressing.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine the pasta, remaining beans, corn, tomatoes, peppers, onions, half of the cilantro.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, combine the pasta, remaining beans, corn, tomatoes, peppers, onions, half of the cilantro.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the dressing and toss to combine. Taste and adjust salt and tang(lime juice). Garnish with cilantro and a very generous dash of black pepper. Serve at room temperature or Chill and serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the dressing and toss to combine. Taste and adjust salt and tang(lime juice). Garnish with cilantro and a very generous dash of black pepper. Serve at room temperature or Chill and serve.

recipeInstructions.text: Variations: Add chopped avocado tossed in lime juice to the salad. Add 2 tsp tomato paste to the dressing. Use your favorite southern chili powder instead of the spices in the dressing.
